name: Anx!ety
description:
A short social-stealth game about navigating loud public spaces with anxiety. Created as a piece of Student Coursework at Abertay University.

Natalie Clayton (@ScarletCatalie) - Art, Design

Emma Houghton (@AllTimeEmma95) - Code, Design

WASD: Movement

Mouse: Click text bubbles

Esc: Close Game
